name: Action
description: Action movies involve intense fight scenes, high-speed chases, and thrilling situations.

name: Comedy
description: Comedy films feature humorous situations that make the audience laugh. They can be combined with other genres such as romance or drama.

name: Slice of Life
description: Slice of Life films depict everyday life, focusing on characters' relationships and emotions in daily situations.

name: Horror
description: Horror movies include elements of fear, the supernatural, and chilling scenes that scare the audience.

name: Fantasy
description: Fantasy films are set in magical or imaginary worlds, often featuring mythical creatures and magical powers.

name: Drama
description: Drama films focus on intense emotional stories, conflicts, and character development in realistic or serious situations.

name: Romance
description: Romantic films center around love stories, emotional connections, and relationships between characters.

name: Thriller
description: Thriller films are intense and suspenseful, keeping the audience on the edge of their seat with dramatic, high-stakes situations.

name: Isekai
description: Isekai films feature characters who are transported to another world, usually with fantasy, adventure, or magical elements.

name: Anime
description: Anime films are Japanese animated films, which span a variety of genres including action, adventure, psychological, and romance.

name: Anime Isekai
description: Anime Isekai films feature protagonists who are transported to alternate worlds, often involving fantasy, magic, and adventure.

name: Anime Slice of Life
description: Anime Slice of Life films focus on everyday experiences, relationships, and character growth in daily life.

name: Movie
description: Movies encompass a wide range of genres, from action and comedy to drama and thriller.

name: News
description: News films provide updates and information on current events, politics, social issues, and cultural happenings.

name: Music
description: Music films focus on music performances, music videos, or stories revolving around musicians and the music industry.
